name: Tara Flowers
text: They still have beautiful flowers for sale. Very few Bonnie plants. They also have plenty of seeds but if you are looking for collards or turnips look elsewhere.

name: James “Jay” Casey
text: Looking for great plants for your garden this summer?  Home Depot at Crestwood Festival Center even has heirloom varieties of tomato plants you will not find other places.

name: Rusty norris
text: The person that put these pics on this site knows what everyone thinks he is. It was a rental fence. People that do this kinda stuff has a special place they will go someday

name: J Moore
text: Chain link fence was installed quickly. Weeks later could not open and shut either gate. I called 3 times, once I was able to speak with someone the other two times no answer but I did leave a message about having my gates fixed. Not even three months after install I have loose pole--nobody has jumped on or claimed fence. Pole by house is canted, and very poor angles on several top posts.

name: Curtis Bush
text: Could not help me.

name: Lam Jam
text: Brad and crew so good work

name: Taylor Thornton
text: They are over priced and couldn’t fix my gate that was under warranty.  They also made me feel like it was my fault. It was not! A 6000 dollar gate shouldn’t mess up every 2 months. They are not nice people!

name: Melissa Davis
text: They were fast, efficient and on time. I will recommend them to my friends.

name: Sherrie Norris
text: There is no record in our calls books of this person.  It is a shame that practically anyone can go to any business on google and slam them.   For every negative you see I can give you references that think otherwise.  We are well thought of in the business community.  If there is a legitimate complaint, I invite you to discuss it with me.

name: Bodyrubs Montgomery
text: Best nuts in the area... including Greenville.

name: Mary JO Bonner
text: It had exactly  what I needed

name: William Brown
text: Extremely rude lady answered the phone

name: Brenda Poole
text: Kinda expensive for a 50' fence.

name: Laura Gibbs
text: Rude.  Terrible customer service and doesn't show up for scheduled appointments!  Not sure how they intend to stay in business.

name: j miles
text: Great bunch of people!!

name: Jordan Boyd
text: Awesome service

name: Tina Epperson
text: Bob was awesome to work with and was always available to answer any questions! They did a wonderful job. Thank you, Bob we love the fence!!

name: Gordy Miller
text: Bob is wonderful - nice person

name: Shanna Berrer
text: I am so pleased with my fence.  Bob and Sandy were friendly and a joy to work with.  My fence was completely finished in 2 days.  I highly recommend Baldwin County Fence.

name: US Citizen
text: I went online and asked for a fence quote.  A rep came out, took all the measurements, said he would get back with us and we never heard another word.  Very unprofessional. I even texted the rep and asked when the quote would be ready. Nothing.

name: Boxcar Willy
text: Won't call back..called twice!

name: Tammy Cook
text: Bob, owner of Baldwin County Fence Company is awesome! Quick response, professional and efficient! If you are in the market for fence, you can count on them!

name: C Taylor
text: Helpful and knowledgeable employees. I have been here often. I actually pass up another improvement store to come to this one. Always have what I need and if they don't they will direct me where to go. The first time I came to this store was when we first moved to an area 35 miles from this store. I needed a Christmas tree. The Christmas trees were having a tuff year because of the drought. They replace the tree with a bigger one because I had to drive so far to come back. Super nice folks. I will continue to drive here for my home improvement needs.

name: Tracy Wyatt
text: Helpful people wonderful place to shop and they care about vets only one thing i have a promblem with is the garden center their plants are not taken care of and the empl oyees are familar with plants.

name: Mark Singleton
text: Found everything I needed except hosta plants

name: Shahari Pierce
text: They always have a great selection of plants and flowers. The deals aren't bad. I do wish they would take better care of the clearance section. When I go, a lot of them are usually knocked over and in dire need of water.

name: Maxine Bailey
text: Nice plants, plenty of seeds on display. Didn't find fingerling potatoes. Guess their spring supply of flowers will be in soon.

name: BYRDIE Yeah
text: They not only did not have what i wanted in stock. but they also had a sales agent in the garden center who absolutely had no knowledge about plants whatsoever. Nor was she willing to get off of her lazy ass to help a customer look either. She just sat there at the register and pointed to a section where she think it might be and began to say how they had them last week but dont know what is or isnt there now. Im like: uhh but you work here and you dont know what you have in stock of the main area where you work..smh

name: Teresa Davis
text: Great place to shop excellent customer service

name: Mary Reese
text: Nice, good prices

name: jamacia rudolph
text: Awesome flowers

name: Matthew Koss
text: Tusco has been great to work with. Both their field and office staff have were very responsive and were more than willing to work with us as a team to solve challenges that arose from some of the unique conditions on our project. The installation + training of their security systems were seamless. I highly recommend Tusco!

name: Teddy Rhodes
text: All around Great People

name: Mike Lamon
text: In 2014 an F1 tornado came through my neighborhood destroying much of the fencing.  My neighbors and I contracted Tusco to replace the damaged fencing.  After several years some of the replaced fencing began to lean.   We contacted Tusco, who sent a representive out to investigate the problem.  He determined that some of the posts had not been treated by the company Tusco buys them from.  Tusco promptly  replaced the fence posts, making our fence new again.  We very much appreciate Tusco's response to the problem, and the professionalism of all who assisted us to include Julie in the office, Rick the supervisor / investigator, and the men who did the repair work.

name: GR82B A MAR10 martin
text: Absolutely the best company in the world!

name: Jeremy Horton
text: Very impressed with the workmanship and quality of their installation.

name: Amanda Provancher
text: Very very very rude. Do not recommend. Very reckless

resp.text:
Amanda, we apologize for any negative impression you may have gotten from our company or employees. If you don't mind, can you please elaborate on your grievance with Tusco? We are a commercial perimeter security contractor, and it is unclear how we may have given such an impression to you personally as we conduct business solely with commercial contractors, property owners, and governmental agencies.

Thank you,

Tusco, Inc.

name: Samantha Hopkins
text: Going inside  the gardening center my first impression  was  the plants on the outside were not listed properly, several  perennial were under annuals and one plant had a arm of ants in it, next the stepping stones were very limited, I was looking for the octagon shaped one no luck, and the two hump barrier stone for flower beds were only in red which is disappointing, some of the plants were a little high considering the condition, also I'd love to know the name of some that happen to be in a planter assortment, left  me wondering.  I didn't like that some were very little detail on the information label but we do have Google  so I can't  complain too much. The cashiers seem to runaway if a customer comes to pay it was very unprofessional and also a waste of my time having to go find both cashiers "helping" customer, one literally was just watching.

name: Kyndall Reynolds
text: The garden center attendant was very knowledgeable of the products and helpful in us choosing a zero turn mower, bagger, and tiller.

name: Barry “Baw” Williams Sr.
text: Awesome!very helpful workers who can help you and know what they talking about too!

name: SandiB
text: Bought a new lawn mower on sale. Was $249 on sale for $186. Troybilt

name: Lora Benson
text:
Cashier was very courteous to her own kind.
Let some guy that just walked up go before me in line. Never ask how I was today like the other patrons whom she had full conversation with. But I did ask her how she was. No-one to help load or unload. All common for this location. Makes you want to drive 10 miles out of the way to Lowes.

name: Juanvinetta Elliott
text: Didn't  have everything I needed but I did get somethings

name: Paul Burnette
text: They didn't have the part that I was trying to find.....

name: Robert Turner Sr
text: Everything were nice and clean. Everyone we're frendly, speaking, wanting to help.as usually. Thanks.

name: elonzo taylor
text: Very neat...found what I was looking for with no problem.

name: Steven Dillon
text: Had what I needed and great price

name: Ron Terry
text: Nice place to visit

name: ohms0704
text: Good

name: Brandon Jackson
text: Helpful and friendly staff. Got my materials loaded quickly

name: Gmaxx 76
text: This place has all your fencing needs. Staff is friendly and helpful. Prices are fair.

name: Perry Berens
text: Hagan has quality products. A knowledgeable staff, good service provided by sales to fabricators of gate frames and gate parts. I recommend the Hagan Fence company above other competitors in all area's of fencing needs.

name: Tina McClinton
text: Came out fast enough was here a total of 4.5 minutes. Was very short with me in a hurry to leave. Didn't take the time to listen. Then an off the wall quote. Needless to say. Went with another highly recommended company. As they took the time to care.

name: Alice Sylvester
text: I recently notified Hagan Fence for a quote and installation. I reviewed and accepted the quote and they finally came out and put up my fence. Upon completion..it took an extra week to get the gate installed..the gate is uneven and one side of the fence does not touch the ground..reason for fence was to keep my dog contained..  I received the invoice and notified the office of the poor quality of installation and I would be more than happy to pay once the fence is corrected. Nathan states “I understand and will make sure it is rectified “. After a few days of not hearing from them and called to speak with manager Steve Trawick, who was out of office, so I sent him an email regarding the same. I have yet to hear from him.  I also sent the representing employee a text that I needed to pay the invoice and want my fence corrected. He , Sam, was very rude and sent a very condescending response.   I have still not heard from anyone at HAGAN FENCE to see if this had been taken care of yet. I just want to get my fence corrected and pay my invoice. Apparently Hagan Fence is not interested in my issues and don’t want my money. Therefore I do not recommend HAGAN FENCE  PLEASE search around for a more caring company that value the work they perform.

name: James Q
text: Smooth transaction and pickup process

name: Nancy Cook
text: Doesn't return calls. I called about replacing my home fence before Sally hit, but didn't hear back.  They must be too busy.

name: Priscilla Young
text: Requesting a quote 3 days ago, no response yet.

name: Michael Garner
text: Sought an estimate and they never called me back.

name: T Rose
text: Hagan Fence is a great company to work with.  The salesman was very helpful and fence workers were nice.  My family loves our new privacy fence around our back yard.  We will be using them again in the future.

name: Derrick Aldridge
text: They had nice 8ft pickets!

name: Saylor c
text: I had an overall great experience! The crew that came out was very hard working and took note of my personal preferences, and I was very satisfied. I would recommend this company to my friends and family.

name: Jimmy Grantham
text: They gave me a quote very quickly and were very professional communicating the details. Thank You

name: Phife 4Life
text: Needs to be an option for zero stars. Do not use this company,  having a terrible experience with them. They employ thru temp services with workers with none to minimum experience.  Installed a fence for me and was not happy with the end result. Very sloppy work screws left out, fence set crooked, doors offset, cheap material. They came out the next day and removed the fence. Now I'm left with nothing haven't heard back from this company in days. Never get any future business from me or my family.

name: Ken Rhodes
text:
Hagan is completing the second fence we purchased from them.  Both experiences were exceptional.  They assisted with the layout, design and choice of fencing that would both provide the security we wanted and enhance the look of our property.
We dealt with the same person on both fences although they were installed over 15-years apart.  Hagan's quality is unsurpassed.  On both occasions, the fences were installed ahead of schedule.
It is a pleasure to work with a company like Hagan that truly cares about providing the highest quality service at a reasonable price.
We will not hesitate to utilize Hagan Fence Company for all our fencing needs and highly recommend them to all.

name: KCWhite Dixiefiddler
text: Fantastic! Not only did they quote a cheaper price than colony and other fence companies but they also  put it in when they said they would and came back to make sure all the specs were right after it settled. Highlighly recommend.

name: billy thomas
text: Nice polite guys very reasonable on price

name: ThaBaddestOneEver
text: THIS COMPANY HAS GOT TO BE THE MOST UNPROFESSIONAL COMPANY IVE EVER DONE BUSINESS WITH! I HIRED THEM TO PUT UP A NEW FENCE FOR US WITH DOUBLE DOORS FOR MORE ROOM TO GET THINGS THROUGH AND THEY SENT TWO GUYS FROM THE TEMP SETVICE (BASICALLY OFF THE STREET) WHO HAD ABSOLUTELY NO EXPERIENCE TO PUT UP OUR FENCE WHICH WAS DONE VERY POORLY, SO BAD TO WHERE THE FENCE WAS NOT MEASURED CORRECTLY AND WAS VERY UNEVEN, THE DRILL AND BIT THEY USED WAS NOT WORKING, AND NOT STRONG ENOUGH TO DRILL THROUGH THE METAL BACKING, (SCREWS MISSING) AND IT WAS AN ALL OVER SLOPPY JOB! SO I TOLD THE MANAGER AND SALESMAN OF THE COMPANY I WOULD NEED FOR THEM TO REDO THE FENCE AND TO SEND SOMEONE WITH MORE EXPERIENCE TO PUT IT BACK UP TO CORRECT THE PROBLEM. THEY CAME BACK, TORE DOWN THE FENCE AND REASSURED ME THAT THEY WOULD TAKE CARE OF IT AND I NEVER HEARD BACK FROM THEM! THIS WAS THREE WEEKS AGO! I WILL TELL ANYBODY TO NOT DO BUSINESS WITH THIS BUSINESS FOR ITS A DISASTER AND THAT THEY SHOULD KEEP THEIR MONEY! SO NOT WORTH IT!!!!!!

name: John Kiel
text: Horrible service & BJ needs to be fired. Save yourself the headache and go elsewhere

name: Chris Springer
text: After using Hagan for 20 years (multiple fences & gates at multiple houses), I just recently had a bad experience with them. Needed some repair work done and called their office. They send a sales guy out who said he would look at the damage and give me a quote. 3 days later I call him after not hearing from him and he quotes me an outrageous price ($640) for what should have been an hour or two worth of work max - in fact, I ended up fixing the gate myself for $20 in hinges in under 2 hours. Before doing it myself, I called and left a voicemail for the manager of this location to inquire as to why their bid was so high - and I still have not received a return call. Hagan just lost any future business from me.

name: Priscilla Laflamme
text: Never came.

name: william smith
text: these people do execellent work

name: Stephanie Owens
text: Unresponsive

name: Jason G
text: Great customer service

name: Marion Murr
text: I cannot imagine anyone complaining about the time it took this company to get their job done.  Can you imagine how many people they had to satisfy after the hurricanes that hit us.  Please, sit back an wait your turn.  Two young men, Hunter and Connor, repaired ours on Saturday and we are so happy with their results.  These young men worked all day, without a break and our yard is pure perfection.  Thank you Hunter and Connor and thank you Turner Wilson.

name: ivy hines
text: Can’t say enough good things about this company! Hurricane Sally destroyed our entire privacy fence and our yard for that matter, but these guys built us back and it looks fantastic! From start to finish with customer service, to quality and the best price in town, we are very happy customers. All my calls went answered and they did everything I asked. They even came all the way to Daphne to help us out.  Almost all of my neighbors have requested their information! They take pride in their work and I would highly recommend them to anyone! Thank you Turner-Wilson Fence Company!

name: Joseph McGinnis
text: Tried to use this business and get in touch with them to install a fence after hurricane damage and was promised by their secretary someone would come out which never happened. My calls were never answered and never received any responses to my voicemails. My new fence was installed by a more professional company. Tried again for fence debris removal and gave them the benefit of the doubt due to the busy hurricane season. They again promised dates but never came out. I don’t know if the secretary doesn’t communicate to the contractors or what, but there is clearly a break down in communication with this company. I do not recommend this company to anyone. Overall poor customer service.

name: Anthony Rocco
text: Gave us a estimate two months ago they keep saying they are coming but they never show up. Don’t waste your time with these criminals.

name: Turon Mcnutt
text: They never returned my call to get an estimate for a fence repair. I would not recommend if I had to determine their work based on that

resp.text: Mr. Mcnutt, I called you back a day or two after you called. I  also came out to your house and measured your yard after we spoke.  I emailed you a quote on 11/25.    I believe you gave your review to the wrong company.    Let us know if you need anything else.   Thank you

name: w.j. spin
text:
THEY ARE NOT BONDED AND DON'T PULL PERMITS!

I hired then to come build a fence. Unfortunately, the type of fence I asked for want allowed in my historic district. They assured me they were a reputable company and would pull the permits, deal with the water company, and has company. They never got the permits. Now the city is telling me if they had, then they would have been told that the specs were not allowed. They built the fence and I paid them cash. Because they aren't bonded, I am now responsible for taking down my fence and putting up another one. I all then to fix it and they said no.

name: Priscilla Young
text: Contacted 3 days ago for a quote, no response yet.

name: elizabeth H
text: They only concreted in the corner poles! After hurricane zeta I realized this is why my fence started to sag not even a year after it was built and now the majority of it has fallen down!

resp.text:
All the posts should be concreted.   Please call us back and we will look into this further.  We need the
address and last name.  Thank you

name: Stephen Karnes
text:
Fast High Quality Work at a Fair Price.

They completed my partial (2/3) fence replacement and it looks great.  Everything I asked for was completed the way I wanted it.  There was one issue with 4x4 posts and the soft ground not being able to hold the heavy gates up, and yes they were using concrete on all the posts.  Anyway, they came back out the following day and added 6x6 posts, which corrected the issue.  They did also have to mod the gate location and inset it a few feet into the back yard, which actually gives the gate a better look imo.  All debris was removed.  They even moved some dirt around to accommodate their fencing.  Very professional, very impressed.  May be the luck of the draw of which labor you get from them.

Note that they charge a minimum for a 100 ft of fence for a job.

name: Christopher Kaelin
text: After waiting 3 weeks I fired them because they never even got stared on the job I hired for them to do. Peplace my old privacy fence

name: John Daniel
text: Great company, great people and great prices! They came out and installed a wood privacy fence for my backyard with a double gate. They did the job really fast and left my yard spotless! Love this company!

name: John House
text: Excellent customer service and quality material.

name: Michael Tomlinson
text: Turner-Wilson did two jobs for me. The quality of the work was very poor and unprofessional. Fence lines not placed as specified, loose posts, gates that won't close. I wasted a lot of money with this company. After reading other reviews I noticed that the Turner-Wilson salesman posted one of the last positive reviews. These people should be avoided.

name: Neil Swartz
text: Over priced

name: Brad Allen
text: I had a privacy fence installed by them. Very easy to work with and they did a great job. Also very professional and Tom Gardner was a great help and the main reason I chose them to do my fence which serves as my service dogs play area. If I ever need a fence I'm calling Tom for whatever I need done.

name: Karen Reed
text: Asked for discription of different kinda of fences. They told me have tho make appt before go into detail. Not satisfied. Won't go back

name: Kevin Benson
text: Didn't do a damn thing they said they were gonna do, barely worked for a few hours a day, left a gape between the fence and the ground big enough for all my dogs to go under completely defeating the purpose of the fence to begin with ,and just a bad real bad job in all. After all this I would never recommend you to anyone

resp.text:
I am sorry that the fence was not installed to your liking.  We have looked in our records and have not located a fence installation in by the name of Benson.
Would it be under a different name?  Also, the address would help us locate this if needed.   We strive to make our customers happy.  Any additional information
you can provide will help.

name: Bill Haisten
text: My father-n-law referred me to this company. Told me they did a great job at a reasonable price. I wouldn't know because when I get lucky enough for someone to answer the phone she tells me someone will return my call, no one ever does. Most of the time no one answers the phone.

name: Kevin Benson
text: Didn't do a damn thing they said they were gonna do, barely worked for a few hours a day, left a gape between the fence and the ground big enough for all my dogs to go under completely defeating the purpose of the fence to begin with ,and just a bad real bad job in all. After all this I would never recommend you to anyone

resp.text:
I am sorry that the fence was not installed to your liking.  We have looked in our records and have not located a fence installation in by the name of Benson.
Would it be under a different name?  Also, the address would help us locate this if needed.   We strive to make our customers happy.  Any additional information
you can provide will help.

name: K Hudson
text: Highly recommend. Professional job and looks great! Best price i could find.

name: Raquel Rios
text: What a great company!

name: Eddie Bugg
text: Great company  strongly recommend.  Fair price and easy to work with.  Great looking fence.

name: Andrew Thigpen (Andrew)
text: Great Job! My new fence is fantastic. Great Workmanship, highly recommend

name: tony thompson
text: Great local company in Mobile AL.  Quality product with a quick response.  Highly recommend.

name: victor maskey
text: Work on fence was completed to my liking. Thank you for fixing

name: Patrick Lansing
text: Came out and installed my security gate for my company last week. Did a great job, very courteous and highly recommend.

name: william smith
text: this place is ran by some great people

name: Tom Gardner
text: Great job  - done on time and budget.  Thanks Turner-Wilson!!!!!

name: Mollie Newsome
text: I like this place because it's a garden Center! I love to be around growing things. The staff are very helpful and seem to know what they're talking about.

name: Arlene Dean
text:
We have shopped here several times & have found what we needed nearly every time. Most recently a gentleman helped us in the plumbing department & knew more about the issue we were having than the so called plumber we hired (that came to our home twice & still didn't fix the issue).
The water refill tube the Home Depot employee opened for us to test, and sold to us, fit perfectly & solved our problem.
We also purchased our holiday tree & holiday greenery at this location.  Nick, the helpful young man that trimmed & wrapped the tree for us, did a perfect job. We have lived in a variety of cities and states and this is hands down our favorite Home Depot location.

name: Scamuel Jones
text: This place is a total loser.  I could not find two common plants I was looking for in the lawn & garden.  Then I clicked to "chat" and was told I was #1 in the queue and then no one ever chatted!  I would suggest not even wasting your time at Home Depot for anything.  Try Lowe's or local nurseries, since these people totally IGNORE their customers!

name: Mason
text: Helpful staff but they often don't have what I'm looking for.

name: Amy Clement
text:
I live just down the street from this Home Depot and EVERY time I go into this store, I can never find anyone to help me.  It looks like a ghost town at the front of the store.  Are you under staffing this store, or are the employees hiding in the back?  I will say that I mostly come to this store after 5pm usually.

I thought it was important to let you know this because if things do not improve, I will just go across the street to Lowe's where they have always been more than happy to help me.  Your store is my neighborhood store, and I want to see you succeed and not go under because of poor management decisions with either hiring bad employees or not paying your staff enough to care about the customers.

Thanks!

name: T Denton
text: I purchased garden soil for blueberry plants.

name: Monika Askew
text: Had to load 40 bags of mulch by myself.  I told the cashier I would need help but he didn't call anyone.  Meanwhile, there were 2 guys loading pine straw and didn't offer to help.

name: Delaney Robertson
text: The whole experience with this company was great! Everyone was very professional and knowledgeable from the sales rep to the crew. They worked fast and efficiently fencing our 1/2 an acre backyard in 2 1/2 days. Extremely impressed and would highly recommend them for fencing.

resp.text: Thank you for the review and your business!

name: Michael Neal
text: A tree fell right through my fence gate to my pool. I called the well known local company that put it up and was told an outrageous number to replace it. Affordable Fencing Solutions came out gave me a price that was less than half of the other companies. They came out the very next day and installed the gate matching exactly the one that was destroyed. I highly recommend them, they were very professional and efficient.

name: Flash Fencing (Jburd)
text: Best place to buy fence product from. The Wholesale has great deals, fast customer service, and plenty of inventory.

name: Mallory Vergara
text: They came when scheduled to measure a fence to get an estimate for price. Dusty or Dustin told me to wait two weeks because he had to hear from the manufactor and I agreed. I had this done in April. I reached out to them in May for my estimate and the sweet lady that answered the phone was very apologetic and told me she would get with him to email me an estimate. Its June 11th and I never got a call back, never got an email that I did verify over the phone. I got nothing this is very poor professional skills that clearly did not want my business. Very disapointed to say the least.

resp.text:
Ms. Vergara,
We apologize that you did not get your estimate. We are looking into this and will be calling you today. Not sure what happened but we will be in touch with you today.

Edit: We do see that Dustin was waiting on a manufacturer to get back with him with a price and they didn’t. We apologize that this slipped through the cracks. We have tried to call you at the number provided from two different phones but it is going straight to Verizon. Please call us at our office 334-384-5222. Thank you.

name: Smokin Tator
text:
Paid cash. Good price, just had to keep calling back to get gate installed properly after set up crew and job appraiser measured wrong.  Secretaries took 4 messages but never passed them to tech.  Took only 2 days to run fence. But From Thanksgiving to February 1 to get gate post reset and adjusted..... Oh yeah and threw old concrete debris in my ditch covert.

Looks & Functions great though. Seems office Secretaries failed and job appraiser didn't do Follow-up on repairs.

Made post only because office repeatedly  failed to answer phone calls and failed to forward messages to techs several times.

Thomas

name: Angelyn Thornton
text: I would not recommend this business to anyone!!!! I paid a 10% deposit and they never came back to repair the gate and fence.I called and called, only to get the run around and no return of my deposit because I signed the contract. I specifically gave instructions to call my house landline phone and leave messages if needed, instead they lied and said they couldn’t get in touch with me. Never again......A Thornton, Columbus Ga

resp.text: Ms. Thornton, upon further investigation I see that YOU yourself cancelled the job to be done. Therefore your deposit was not refunded as per the contract you signed and the response we sent to JAG about you signing a contract with a “non refundable deposit”.

name: David Perryman
text: Run this  company didn't even  bore one hole for a fence post . Me and wife paid them nearly $400.00  for a deposit.  After I signed  the paperwork they scheduled  us for the following  month. That date came I didn't hear from anyone. I finally called a week later  I was told that they had some internal issues  and some call backs on some previous  jobs.  I was told they  would come out that next week if the weather permits . The weather was good the following  week all week long I didn't hear from anyone . Then I called again  the week after no answer until I got a text saying they didn't know when they will come out . After I asked for our deposit back they tell us its nonrefundable.  I can understand that part but after not standing up to their  promises or schedule you would think a company like this would have some integrity they don't have none.  I am on a budget  and everyone doesn't have nearly  $400.00 to throw away . So who ever read this think twice  unless you have money to throw away.

name: Trena Hazen
text: Purchased a home and needed a fence. Called and set up a time. Came out and gave a quote. Very friendly and answered all my questions.  Took maybe a day longer than he told us but was happy they got to us in a timely manner. Would recommend.

name: Samantha Huntley
text: We had our existing fence replaced by them. I have reached out several times when the fence was being installed. The crew left a mess behind that I cleaned up. There were several loose boards that my husband had to attach because they never responded to calls. Now two months later the double gate that they installed would not open. After 2 weeks of them not responding I went to the office. Finally a guy came out and told our daughter they needed to replace the metal frame and would be back in a few days.  That was about  2 weeks ago and still no frame and no phone call back to repair what I already paid for!

name: Tyler Morgan
text: Great staff and helpful advice. Will use them for future fencing projects!

name: Jon Futch
text:
- Start date was two weeks after they promised to start; doubt they would have started when they did if I didn't complain.
- Told me project would take no more than 2.5 days
- Project took 5 weeks from start to finish. 450 feet of fence and three gates. Not a big project.
- Crews would show up for couple of hours and then vanish. Then would have to call to get them back a few days later.
- No oversight of work crews; project manager never visited site until I requested.
- Poor communication; seemed like I would always have to call to find out why no work was being done or done poorly.
- No one accepts responsibility for issues, just blame someone else at the company.
- Company very unorganized with little care for what they put you through as a customer and the inconvenience they are causing.
-Owner did finally come out to site at the end - too little to late in my opinion.
- They sure are quick to expect payment when they are finally completed with your fence.
- Would not recommend them to anyone and if I run into issues with warranty work on this fence in the future would not let them work on it anyway.
- This is my first review of anything, ever.

resp.text:
The original start date for this job was the week of  5/11-5/15 2020. Work began on 5/22/20. Unfortunately outside projects can not always meet a projected time frame, due to weather and other unforeseen circumstances. On 5/22/20 the customer changed the type of material to be installed. New material was then ordered, but would not arrive until the following week. The job was completed on 6/5/20. After the customer stated he had some issues, we returned on 6/11/20 to address them. We called the customer to let him know that the issues had been addressed. Customer called again 8 days later on 6/19/20 stating that he was still not satisfied with the repairs. A crew was sent out at the earliest possible date, which was the following week. The owner visited the job site on three different occasions prior to 6/19/20. The first time he met with the customer's wife and with the customer via telephone, the two following trips were with the customer via telephone. We made every effort to address every issue that was expressed to us. We called after the last trip on 6/19/20 to inform the customer the job was complete. After several days of no response from the customer, he called us back stating that he would "pay us when he felt like it". Despite the fact that the customer's contract states payment is due upon completion, and there is a late fee after 48 hours of non payment, we were patient, accepting and waived the late fee due to issues the customer felt he had with his project. We also gave him a discount for his inconvenience, and waited another week before calling him again. We finally received payment on 8/3/20.

In short, we were not 2 weeks behind on this job, we were 1 week late and had to be pushed further due to changes made by the customer. We made every good faith attempt to satisfy this customer, and were patient in receiving payment, despite his claims. Our goal is satisfaction and pleasant dealings with all our customers, unfortunately this is not always possible.

name: Charles Starling
text: Very affordable fast and friendly people. I would recommend these guys to anyone

name: Chris Padgett
text: We worked with this company on our fencing.  Initially, there were some problems.  But I got to give Jason and Affordable Fencing Solutions credit for coming back again and again until we did have our solution.  While the project took longer than either us would have liked, he showed incredible character and integrity to get a wonderful finished product.  I would certainly utilize their services again.

name: Christy Bass
text: Had 2 appointment and both were a no show. First one was Friday at 12:30 and the next was today at 8am. No show on both.

resp.text: We apologize for the inconvenience this caused you. We had a miscommunication among scheduling and our salesmen. Someone will be contacting you very soon. Once again we truly apologize for this.

name: Ephesia Witherspoon
text: Called this company to come and widen my fence, a guy comes out and looks at it then says he has to get his boss to look at it and said his boss would be here the same day, the boss NEVER showed up and that guy NEVER came back or called about my fence. I am realizing that a lot of businesses in this area are unreliable and I will make sure everyone is aware of that.

resp.text: We must have had an internal breakdown of communication and sincerely apologize. We will have someone reach out to you immediately.

name: Rj Morris
text:
Amazed at how professional this fence company was.  Most I have dealt with in the past were horrible at following up.  This company answered the phone every time I called.  They did everything  they promised.  And of course the fence turned out beautiful.

Wish I had another fence I needed because they were so awesome to deal with.

name: Heather Hunter
text: Call Affordable Fencing Solutions for quick and dependable work! Always there to answer my questions and help in a timely manner!

name: Michelle Elliott
text: Fence is beautiful. It was very affordable. Went up quickly. Only had a few minor hiccups, but they made SURE it was perfect before the job was completed.

name: Dayna Greer
text: They did a great job installing our black, chain link fence last Aug when we moved into our new house. We needed it done ASAP when we moved in so that our dogs would be able to go out and everything was done promptly in 2 days! In January, a tornado came through our backyard, leaving downed trees all over the fence. It was completely trashed but they came out and took out the old one and put up a brand new one in it's place overnight! Great service... I'd highly recommend!

name: Stephanie Benison
text: Very professional, prompt and affordable.

name: Kerry Jenkins
text: My hubby's work place

name: Pam Owen
text: Not very reliable.  Did not show up for an appointment and did not call

resp.text: I’m truely sorry for the inconvience. Someone will call you shortly.

name: terry mccrary
text: They are very expert at what they do..

name: Timothy Taylor
text: My wife and I were looking for something to replace the old plastic edging around our flower beds and some fresh soil to work into the beds. No problems there. We got ready to check out, and Home Depot decided to do their best Walmart impression...9 or 10 customers waiting to check out, only 1 register open.😖  After about 12-15 minutes in line, the second register finally opened.

name: Diane Lewis
text: Love the garden center, beautiful flowers they had a sale on potting soil, good deal but no one there to help I have a bad hand and needed help with soil but couldn't find any one

name: Bobby Gilliland
text: very good in every way.

name: Bryan McElroy
text: Home and garden building supplies tools.

name: Ultreya Park
text: Fantastic experience. Super helpful guy (and beautiful resident black cat) who exchanged, without problem, a plant I bought a few weeks ago that perished. Much more room than some garden centers, making it easy to get around with wide aisles. Lots of variety in annuals and perrenial plants and all the rest, pots, rocks, soil and anything for outside. Wish they would keep the garden center gates open when the store is open for that last hour shopping errand.

name: Jared Persons
text:
Just purchased a big grille!!!!
Home depot employee from lighting DEPT , stopped what he was doing to help me wheel grille to register and then outside to my trailer to help load it up.
He could of easily sent me on a wild goose chase to find someone in the lawn and garden section, but he didn't.....That's hard to find these days in retail stores...

name: Bit Bucket
text: It was good for us today! Because of the freezing weather, herbs were knocked down to 3 bucks. Some of them were not hurt.

name: lovesickforone
text: Loved thier garden dpt.! Great plants...good variety

name: Christopher Brown
text: Drove from Bayou la Batre they had only part of what I needed but they just out. Big selling I belive

name: Judith Word
text: The garden department staff & all employees and management here have been very friendly and helpful

name: Russell Pilling
text: I live in Theodore and went to Lowe's first waited forty minutes to be told by the man in lawn and garden he would be there soon waiting for another fifteen minutes went to Home Depot got a riding mower and gone in fifteen minutes that's faster than Jimmy Johnson LOLOL

name: hector macias
text: ,,love shopping here everytime a make a delivery,,

name: John F. Helmer
text:
The tarp I ordered is outstanding. Great material and quality workmanship.

I especially appreciate the feedback and advice I got from both Rob and Josh.

Lookout Mountain Tarp does good work!

Thank you.

name: Anita Dickerson
text: Great Tarp! Fits like a glove! Exceeded our expectations.

name: Randy Green
text: Great ,  very intelligent  young men

name: Angela Reynolds
text: Always friendly and they are ready on the spot to help I have never waited for service

name: Loretta Schafer
text: If you're looking for a good tarp that will last this is a good place to go.

text: Bought a coil tarp a couple moths ago and just used it.  Very pleased, and the customer service was very help full and understanding
